title: Thenmerku Paruva Kaatru Lyrics Karuthamma
stanzas: <div>Thenmerku Paruva Kaatru Song Lyrics Karuthamma

[thenmerku paruvakatru
thaeni pakkam veesum podhu
saaral inba saaral

themmaangu paadikondu
silu siluvena sindhuthamma
thooral muththu thooral

vengaattu pakkak  kalli
sattendru mottuvida
sengaattu chilli chedi
sillendra poovedukka ] (2)

thenmerku paruvakatru
thaeni pakkam veesum podhu
saaral inba saaral

vaanoadum mannodum
illaadha vannangal
pennodum kannodum
naan kaangiren

thaalaattil illaadha
sangeetha saarangal
paaraattum un paattil
naan ketkiren

mazhai thuli enna
thavam thaan seidhadho
malar konda maarbodu
thottaaduthe

mazhai thuli thotta
idam nee theendavo
ninaikkayil ulloora
kalloorudhe

thenmerku paruvakatru
thaeni pakkam veesum podhu
saaral inba saaral

themmaangu paadikondu
silu siluvena sindhuthamma
thooral muththu thooral

vengaattu pakkak  kalli
sattendru mottuvida
sengaattu chilli chedi
sillendra poovedukka

thenmerku paruvakatru
thaeni pakkam veesum podhu
saaral inba saaral

themmaangu paadikondu
silu siluvena sindhuthamma
thooral muththu thooral

Nee endrum naan endrum
iru vaarthai ondraagi
naam endra or vaarthai
unndaanathe

aanendrum pen endrum
iru varthai undraagi
aal endra or vaarthai
undaanathe

kadhal endra mandhirathin
maayam enna
kallum mullum ippodhu
poovaanadhe

vaanavillain thundondru
mannil vandhu
yaarukkum sollaamal
pennaanathe.

[thenmerku paruvakatru
thaeni pakkam veesum podhu
saaral inba saaral

themmaangu paadikondu
silu siluvena sindhuthamma
thooral muththu thooral

vengaattu pakkak kalli
sattendru mottuvida
sengaattu chilli chedi
sillendra poovedukka ] (2)
